title: Frequently Asked Questions
subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services

q1.question: How far in advance should I book?
q1.answer: We recommend booking at least 2-3 weeks in advance, especially for weekends and holidays. However, we'll do our best to accommodate last-minute bookings when possible.

q2.question: Can I change or cancel my booking?
q2.answer: Yes, you can modify your booking up to 7 days before the party date. Cancellations made within 7 days may be subject to a cancellation fee.

q3.question: What deposit is required?
q3.answer: We require a 30% deposit to secure your booking, with the remaining balance due on the day of the party.

q1.question: What's included in the party packages?
q1.answer: Each package includes venue rental, decorations, entertainment, and basic setup. Food and additional services can be added separately.

q2.question: Can I bring my own food?
q2.answer: Yes, you can bring your own food, or choose from our catering menu. We also accommodate special dietary requirements.

q3.question: How many children can attend?
q3.answer: This depends on the package you choose. Our packages range from 10 to 50+ children. Contact us for custom arrangements for larger groups.

q1.question: Is the venue safe for children?
q1.answer: Absolutely! Our venue is specifically designed with children's safety in mind, with soft play areas, supervised activities, and child-friendly facilities.

q2.question: Do you have parking available?
q2.answer: Yes, we have free parking available for guests.

q3.question: Is the venue accessible?
q3.answer: Yes, our venue is fully accessible with wheelchair ramps and accessible facilities.

q1.question: Can parents stay during the party?
q1.answer: Yes, parents are welcome to stay. We have a comfortable seating area where you can relax while we entertain the children.

q2.question: Do you provide entertainment?
q2.answer: Yes, all our packages include professional entertainers. Additional entertainment options can be added to your package.

q3.question: What if my child has special needs?
q3.answer: We're happy to accommodate children with special needs. Please let us know in advance so we can make appropriate arrangements.

contact.title: Still have questions?
contact.description: Contact us and we'll be happy to help!
